description:
At the start of battle, your {CLASS_Nature} creatures gain [icons,1976]Rune of Nax.

Rune of Nax: Target takes a large amount of damage, caster gains a moderate amount of a random stat, and the caster's on-attack effects are activated. 100% of this spell's damage is based on the caster's highest stat.
name: Rune of Nax
